title: oc6 rc2: debug msg declared/shows as an error: could not find category \"_$!<favorite>!$_\"
body:
t. tanghus asked me to open it as a core issue (see https://github.com/owncloud/contacts/issues/280)

whenever i click in the webbrowser on the contacts app icon on the left, the following exception message shows up as error in the admin setting page in the log section:

{"app":"core","message":"oc\\tags::getfavorites, exception: could not find category \"$!\<favorite\>!$\"","level":3,"time":"2013-12-03t15:35:58+00:00"}

thomas said it's just a debug message, so i would like to ask you to downgrade the level of the expection from error to debug so it does no longer shows up in the log section of the admin settings page and confuses/alarms administrators (like me).
